title: LG Refrigerator BASKET ASSEMBLY,DOOR
description: LG Refrigerator BASKET ASSEMBLY,DOOR ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 7 Reviews PartSelect Number PS7786027 Manufacturer Part Number AAP73631702 This is an OEM door shelf designed for LG refrigerators. This shelf measures 8 inches deep and 14 inches wide, is made of white and clear plastic, and hooks into the side of the door within the refrigerator. This shelf is used to hold any condiments, cups, or food items that you would need it to hold and secure. If the shelf in your refrigerator is chipped, cracked, or broken, it will need to be replaced to continue to hold anything.

installationInstructions.author: David R from BARTO, PA
installationInstructions.title: The clear plastic guards cracked.
installationInstructions.content: Installed easily.  Left out old snap on new.  Service over phone was excellent
